name: Peaceful Sleep
description:
Peaceful Sleep

A simple platformer game for the Mini Jam 105.

How to play

Collect all 5 Items to get peaceful sleep.

You will need a good eye and special ability's to get them all.

Controlls

A/D or ◀/▶ to Move

Space, W or ▲ to Jump

When available:

rshift or rctrl to Dash

dash + jump for HighJump
